name: nanogallery
title: jQuery nanoGALLERY
description: Very easy to implement image gallery plugin for jQuery. It is touch enabled, responsive, fast and it supports cloud storage. Featuring multi-level navigation in albums, lightbox, many hover effects on thumbnails, slideshow, fullscreen, pagination, image lazy load, deep linking, themes, bootstrap compatibility, customizable, i18n, and pulling in Flickr/Picasa/Google+ photo albums among others.
